sp_instance.title: 404 message
sp_instance.widget_parameters:
{ "html": { "value": "

${Sorry, the page you requested was not found.}

${This page you were trying to reach at this address doesn't seem to exist. This is usually the result of a bad or outdated link OR you do not have proper roles assigned to view this page. Please create an incident to get assistance on your issue . We apologize for any inconvenience.}

${While you are here, see if you can beat the "404" in a game of Breakout.}

", "displayValue": "

${Sorry, the page you requested was not found.}

${This page you were trying to reach at this address doesn't seem to exist. This is usually the result of a bad or outdated link OR you do not have proper roles assigned to view this page. Please create an incident to get assistance on your issue . We apologize for any inconvenience.}

${While you are here, see if you can beat the "404" in a game of Breakout.}

" } }
